GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v5.10.150
GSD.description:
net: rds: don't hold sock lock when cancelling work from rds_tcp_reset_callbacks()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit da349221c4d2d4ac5f606c1c3b36d4ef0b3e6a0c, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit ac3615e7f3cffe2a1a6b25172dfd09e138593d82. For more details please see the references link.
